messenger.name: Messenger Traversing Hackerspace
messenger.desc4: When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, SPD for all allies increases by 12% for 1 turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.

disiciple.name: Longevous Disciple
disiciple.desc4: When the wearer is hit or has their HP consumed by an ally or themselves, their CRIT Rate increases by 8% for 2 turn(s) and up to 2 stacks.

pioneer.name: Pioneer Diver of Dead Waters
pioneer.desc2: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with debuff by 12%.
pioneer.desc4: Increases CRIT Rate by 4%. The wearer deals 8%/12% increased CRIT DMG to enemies with at least 2/3 debuffs. After the wearer inflicts a debuff on enemy targets, the aforementioned effects increase by 100%, lasting for 1 turn.

duke.name: The Ashblazing Grand Duke
duke.desc4: When the wearer uses follow-up attacks against the target enemy, increase the wearer's ATK by 6% for every time the follow-up attack deals DMG. This effect can stack for a maximum of 8 times and lasts for 3 turns. This effect is removed the next time the wearer uses a follow-up attack.

knight.name: Knight of Purity Palace
knight.desc4: Increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the shield created by the wearer by 20%.

musketeer.name: Musketeer of Wild Wheat
musketeer.desc4: The wearer's SPD increases by 6% and Basic ATK DMG increases by 10%.

passerby.name: Passerby of Wandering Cloud
passerby.desc4: At the beginning of the battle, immediately recovers 1 Skill Point.

eagle.name: Eagle of Twilight Line
eagle.desc4: After the wearer uses Ultimate, their action is Advanced Forward by 25%.

hunter.name: Hunter of Glacial Forest
hunter.desc4: After the wearer unleashes their Ultimate, their CRIT DMG increases by 25% for 2 turn(s).

prisoner.name: Prisoner in Deep Confinement
prisoner.desc4: For every DoT the target enemy is afflicted with, the wearer will ignore 6% of target's DEF when dealing DMG to them. This effect is valid for a max of 3 DoTs.

boxer.name: Champion of Streetwise Boxing
boxer.desc4: After the wearer attacks or is hit, their ATK increases by 5% for the rest of the battle. This effect can stack up to 5 time(s).

arena.name: Rutiliant Arena
arena.desc2: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 70% or higher, the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill DMG increase by 20%.

keel.name: Broken Keel
keel.desc2: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by 10%. When the wearer's Effect RES is at 30% or higher, all allies' CRIT DMG increases by 10%.

fleet.name: Fleet of the Ageless
fleet.desc2: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 12%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, all allies' ATK increases by 8%.

salsotto.name: Inert Salsotto
salsotto.desc2: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 50% or higher, the wearer's Ultimate and follow-up attack DMG increases by 15%.

firmament.name: Firmament Frontline: Glamoth
firmament.desc2: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD is equal to or higher than 135/160, the wearer deals 12%/18% more DMG.
